timeline.message: Implement a select neighbor function that uses a heuristic the accounts for distances between candidates.
Add function to array store that returns a writeable reference to an array.
Add interface used to randomly draw the max level a new hnsw node should exist in.
Add support for adding a new document in multiple levels in the graph.

timeline.bodyText: i found it easier to have level as "int" always.  that also allows _entry_level = -1 to signal no valid level.
timeline.author: arnej27959

timeline.message: Store entry level as an int to simplify add_document() function.
